      • getAllAssertedInContext

        public List<com.cyc.kb.Assertion> getAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context ctx,
                                                          boolean allowExpensiveContexts)
                                                   throws com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException,
                                                          com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException,
                                                          IllegalArgumentException
        Returns all of the assertions that are directly asserted within an Mt. This method specifically does not return any assertions that are merely visible from the Mt.

        There are cases where this method is useful, such as in general-purpose knowledge editing applications for the Cyc KB, but it should be used with caution. This method is currently not included in the official KB API for two reasons:

        1. In practice, it's rarely used: most applications never need to use it, and it would in fact be the wrong approach. What is much more commonly useful is retrieving relevant answers to a specific question (typically as KbTerms from a query) in which case what matters is an assertion's visibility from an Mt. When applications directly interact with assertions, it is typically by retrieving the predicate extent for some relevant KbPredicate, or to create or delete specific assertions whose Mt is either already known or easily retrievable.
        2. It's potentially very expensive. Retrieving the contents of a small, application-focused Mt is relatively quick, but retrieving the contents of a broad Mt like #$UniversalVocabularyMt may take upwards of an hour or possibly even longer. Even some Mts like #$CurrentWorldDataCollectorMt-NonHomocentric may contain ~10,000 assertions.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the specified Context
        allowExpensiveContexts - whether to allow this method to run on broad Mts. If false, this method will throw an exception when run against such Mts.
        Returns:
        all of the Assertions asserted directly in the specified Context
        Throws:
        com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException
        com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException
        IllegalArgumentException - if given an expensive Context when not allowed
        See Also:
        KbPredicate.getExtent(), KbPredicate.getExtent(com.cyc.kb.Context), KbPredicate.getFact(com.cyc.kb.Context, java.lang.Object...), KbPredicate.getFacts(java.lang.Object, int, com.cyc.kb.Context), KbPredicate.getValuesForArgPosition(java.lang.Object, int, int, com.cyc.kb.Context), KbPredicate.getValuesForArgPositionWithMatchArg(java.lang.Object, int, int, java.lang.Object, int, com.cyc.kb.Context)

      • getAllAssertedInContext

        public List<com.cyc.kb.Assertion> getAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context ctx)
                                                   throws com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException,
                                                          com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException,
                                                          IllegalArgumentException
        Returns all of the assertions that are directly asserted within an Mt. This method specifically does not return any assertions that are merely visible from the Mt, and will throw an IllegalArgumentException when called on expensive/broad Mts.

        This method is currently not included in the official KB API, and it should be used with caution. For more details, see getAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context, boolean).

        Parameters:
        ctx - the specified Context
        Returns:
        all of the Assertions asserted directly in the specified Context
        Throws:
        com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException
        com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException
        IllegalArgumentException - if given an expensive Context
        See Also:
        KbPredicate.getExtent(), KbPredicate.getExtent(com.cyc.kb.Context), KbPredicate.getFact(com.cyc.kb.Context, java.lang.Object...), KbPredicate.getFacts(java.lang.Object, int, com.cyc.kb.Context), KbPredicate.getValuesForArgPosition(java.lang.Object, int, int, com.cyc.kb.Context), KbPredicate.getValuesForArgPositionWithMatchArg(java.lang.Object, int, int, java.lang.Object, int, com.cyc.kb.Context)

      • getCountOfAllAssertedInContext

        public int getCountOfAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context ctx,
                                          boolean allowExpensiveContexts)
                                   throws com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException,
                                          com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException,
                                          IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the number of assertions that are directly asserted within an Mt. This method specifically does not return any assertions that are merely visible from the Mt.

        This method is currently not included in the official KB API, and it should be used with caution. For more details, see getAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context, boolean).

        Parameters:
        ctx - the specified Context
        allowExpensiveContexts - whether to allow this method to run on broad Mts. If false, this method will throw an exception when run against such Mts.
        Returns:
        a count of all of the Assertions asserted directly in the specified Context
        Throws:
        com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException
        com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException
        IllegalArgumentException - if given an expensive Context when not allowed

      • getCountOfAllAssertedInContext

        public int getCountOfAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context ctx)
                                   throws com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException,
                                          com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException,
                                          IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the number of assertions that are directly asserted within an Mt. This method specifically does not return any assertions that are merely visible from the Mt, and will throw an IllegalArgumentException when called on expensive/broad Mts.

        This method is currently not included in the official KB API, and it should be used with caution. For more details, see getAllAssertedInContext(com.cyc.kb.Context, boolean).

        Parameters:
        ctx - the specified Context
        Returns:
        a count of all of the Assertions asserted directly in the specified Context
        Throws:
        com.cyc.kb.exception.KbTypeException
        com.cyc.kb.exception.CreateException
        IllegalArgumentException - if given an expensive Context
